channel.title: Job site for stay at home parents?
channel.description:
Something Steve mentioned on the last podcast episode was hiring stay at home parents, in this instance for a support role I have. The idea being to get someone probably a bit over qualified who values the flexibility a business like mine can give them over getting more money for a full time roll elsewhere.
Has anyone seen job sites catering to that demographic, I can't find any with a bit of googling, maybe someone has actually used one :)
